Class App

public class App extends Object

    Method

    getInstance()

    • getInstance

      public static App getInstance()
      get the instance of the App singleton and initialize the instance if it is null
      Returns:
      the instance of the App singleton

    • refreshCollections

      public void refreshCollections()
      refresh the data for all collections

    • init

      public void init()
      initialize the collections of the app, remove the inactive currency accounts and apply the interests on credit and saving accounts

    • exit

      public void exit(Integer exitCode) throws BusinessException
      save the current state of the application and exit with the exit code supplied
      Parameters:
      exitCode - The code the app should exit with
      Throws:
      BusinessException - occurs when the file manager is not able to serialize

    • saveCollections

      public void saveCollections() throws BusinessException
      save the state of all the app collections
      Throws:
      BusinessException - occurs when the file manager is not able to serialize the data for reason like file not found or IO exception

    • loadCollections

      public void loadCollections()
      load data from the serialized file
